extendedInfo.description: Hi Launcher is an iPhone Style and Android Capability Launcher.  You can get the iPhone user experience in Android Phone!Major Feature- Support Same look and touch feeling with iPhone- Support Search desktop: a convenient search applications, contacts, SMS, e-mail.- Support for Themes to choose a different style desktop.- Support iPhone Wallpaper Setting- Support iPhone Icon Folder- Support High Quality Icons- Support restore default feature- Support customize application icon & name;- Support hide application icon;- No difference between the icon rendering and arrangement and iPhone- Support iOS7 iPhone Lock Screen with configuration funcation- Support android 2.2 devices- Support recommend apps download- Support iOS 7 theme- Support online theme download- Support Samsung Galaxy S4 and HTC one- Support 1080P resolution- Support Hi Dev Studio Bundles License Key Major Operation Mode- Long press icon to enter into the icon editing mode- Under Edit mode you can drag the icon position- Under Edit mode you can click on the icon in the upper-left corner of the "X" icon to quickly delete the shortcut or uninstall applications- Under Edit mode you can click on the icon in the upper-right corner  icon to hide and rename applications.- Under Edit mode you can drag and overlap icon to create a folder- Under Lock screen Long press Camera button to popup Call, Music, Browser,Message button. Click Call button will switch the Camera and Call.Tag: iPhone Style, iOS, Launcher, Folder, Wallpaper, Screen Lock, iOS7, iOS 7 theme,iPhone 5, iPhone 4SIf you meet any issue, pls don't just rate one star. We hope your email the issue to hidevstudio(at)gmail.com, we will definitely feedback and resolve your issue asap.Or follow usFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/HiDevStudioTwitter:https://twitter.com/hidevstudioWe are welcome volunteer to help us for different language translation, if you have time pls contact with us.Let's go to enjoy it!Will provide more theme later!You can get more iPhone Style and Android capability Apps in "Hi Dev Studio".Thanks!

reviews.title: My apps are lost!! !
reviews.comment: Every time I reboot my phone my apps in folders are returning into screen and uh! My games are hidden and it needs to search in tab before I cn find it!  Anw a good launcher than others just fix this ill gve you 5 star if you\'ll reply
reviews.author: Johnfox Jemy

reviews.title: Superb but
reviews.comment: Everytime I close some app, the launcher took so long to recover. I would love this if you guys fix that right away.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LG optimus l7 P705
reviews.comment: It\'s a excellent home for normal android make look like iPhone truly love this app (5star\'s)  %GAK%

reviews.title: Iphone 5 clone
reviews.comment: Perfect on my iphone 5 clone, ill give five star if ios 7 lock screen are avilable.

reviews.title: Nice but where the status bar?
reviews.comment: Hi hi dev studio i really like your app but can you make an iphone status bar? Thx
reviews.author: Erik Barcebal

reviews.title: Apps take a while to load?
reviews.comment: I love your app. But apps take a while to load whenever I unlock my screen. Please do fix it!
reviews.author: Caren Viniegra

reviews.title: Brilliant except..
reviews.comment: Brilliant except would be perfect if you could change icons of apps and download icon packages, some app icons don\'t match the themes eh iOS 7 please fix
reviews.author: Shell Connolly

reviews.title: Good but not enough
reviews.comment: Good because it\'s smooth. Not good because it doesn\'t replace some of my apps. 4 example, I use walkman as my music app, but when I tap music, it says app not installed. Also would be better if it supports icon packs to replace the icons, cuz apps looks bad with the icon mask. Reinstalled new update, still can\'t use icon pack, uninstalling. Until next update~
reviews.author: Ivan Irawan

reviews.title: I love you hi
reviews.comment: I\'ve always wanted an iphone for my birthday,but I didn\'t get one I got a Motorola photon Q you can do the stuff like an iPhone but its not.I saw this downloaded it,and BOOM!It turned my boring phone to look like an iPhone 5 I love this app!!!!
reviews.author: Klaus esteban

reviews.title: the widgets takes so long to appear
reviews.comment: please fix this, it takes so long for my phone to see the widgets, in this launcher... i think espier is much better than this, but hi launcher looks better...
reviews.author: Aljohn Cano

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: its awesome
reviews.author: blove Lastik

reviews.title: Good.
reviews.comment: Please. Fix the Locker. The slider is to big. And the writings that says slide to unlock is so Large. Not fitted to the bar ;/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I luv it! Giving it 5 stars. Can you add a status bar?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: change icon
reviews.comment: Would be better if i could change the app icon like i can on espier launcher. Allow it and ill give 5 stars.
reviews.author: joseph perry

reviews.title: Good but still some work to do.
reviews.comment: Launcher tend to forget my apps, I have to rearrange them. sometimes takes too long to load.  Does not support shortcuts such as line messenger contacts. Scrolling could be smoother on HTC ONE or option to adjust.And finally I wouldn\'t mind if status bar would be see trough but maybe that\'s too much .Exiting launcher settings, putting me to the search page witch is slightly annoying.hi Launcher  Lock screen on, totally ignoring my security setting. Letting me access my phone without any security measure.
reviews.author: Laslo Nadge

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Thanx guys *.*
reviews.author: Ghaith bedlam

reviews.title: Gts5570 custom rom non-compatibality
reviews.comment: Okay, here it is, a Samsung Galaxy Mini with PAC Rom(i don\'t remember what version). I can\'t launch it. Every time I clicked the icon, it bring me to the launcher, but the launcher kept restarting over & over again. I love this launcher a lot. Please do something & make it up for person which might facing the same problem as me.
reviews.author: Keisuke Akito

reviews.title: good but...
reviews.comment: i cannot open my hide apps please fix it
reviews.author: Desmond Haojitan

reviews.title: Canvas 2
reviews.comment: Make a iPhone style status bar ......it would be nice
reviews.author: Kannan King

reviews.title: Better than Espier
reviews.comment: Been using espier launcher for years wish I would have been using this. Using the HI launcher, settings, and keyboard apps with the espier browser makes the most complete ios feel on android. Great work!!
reviews.author: Josh Maguire
